Name: BANANO BROS.
About the game: Banano Bros is a retro arcade game inspired by the old time classics of the 80's. This game is a vertical endless runner with procedurally generated obstacles where your only goal is trying to beat your own record and playing with your friends. Key Features Play in singleplayer, local cooperative multiplayer or local versus multiplayer. Attract your partner to you to save him from death or kill him in versus mode. Climb to the clouds and collect bananos to multiply your score. Dodge insects and coconuts. Retro pixel graphics inspired in the old game systems. Awesome retro music made by the artist Ozzed. Steam archievements. Compatible with gamepad.
